column4: I installed 9.04 on two drives on my machine, I can boot from both and run them but I want to trash one (because I don't need it) and connect up another drive to transfer data, but when I remove any drive I get grub 21 or 22 errors.  How should I go about fixing?
not sure of the specifics.. but i think you need to remove one.. and reinstall grub so that it sees the grub files and menu.lst and stuff from the drive that is installed.
ive fought with grub so many times i normally can get it going.. but its hard to tell someone remotely what needs to be done.
I just installed +built a couple of bin and installed some stuff, would it be less effort to just format both drives reinstall?
